title: Dominating (111) facets with ordered stacking in perovskite films
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01863J, Paper
Xiaotao Liu, Xiaoqing Jiang, Yanfeng Yin, Jiafeng Zhang, Hao Tian, Junxue Guo, Xin Guo, Can Li
The (111) facet-dominated FAPbI3 perovskite films are prepared by a two-step method, which is realized by the additive-induced growth inhibition of the (100) facet, yielding 25.23% efficiency for perovskite solar cells with excellent stability.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
